name: Bruce Wayne
bio: As the CEO of Wayne Enterprises, Bruce likes money. He is also definitely not Batman.

talks.title: The importance of good insurance
talks.description: Bruce will discuss how he makes sure the insurance policies that cover his buildings include cover for damage caused by superheroes, and gives some tips on negotiating with insurers that may apply even if you're not a world-class businessman.

name: Batman
bio: Batman is Batman. Not Bruce Wayne. He's never even heard of him.

talks.title: Building a secret underground lair, secretly
talks.description: Everybody wants a secret underground lair these days, they're so hot right now. But how does one get the right planning permission, and what construction skills do you need when there's only you and your butler to do it all.

talks.title: Punching bad people
talks.description: How to punch bad people without killing them. But still punching them. A lot.

name: Dr Bruce Banner
bio: Bruce enjoys yoga, relaxing, long walks on the beach, and nuclear radiation.

talks.title: Gamma rays for fun and profit
talks.description: Gamma radiation has a bad rap these days, but there are plenty of ways to use it safely. Note: some attendees may get irradiated during the demonstration.

talks.title: SMASH
talks.description: Hulk show puny humans how to smash. Hulk remember not to smash puny humans. Not like last time.
